# Data preparation

```{r results = TRUE}
df_games <- read.csv('data/games.csv')
# Remove unnecessary columns
df_games <- df_games %>% select(
    -c(Estimated.owners, About.the.game, Reviews, Header.image,
       Website, Support.url, Support.email, Metacritic.url, Notes, Screenshots, Movies))

kable(head(df_games %>% select(c(AppID, Name, Release.date, Price, Metacritic.score)), 5))
```

```{r}
write.csv(df_games, 'data/games_clean.csv', row.names = FALSE)
```
